Legal_Issue: Whether the Refugee Protection Division (RPD) erred in concluding that state protection was available to the applicant
Application_Facts: Applicant is a Shia Muslim from Pakistan claiming persecution; RPD accepted credibility but relied on outdated country condition reports
Decision_Outcome: Application for judicial review allowed; decision remanded for redetermination
Court_Ruling: RPD decision flawed due to selective reliance on outdated evidence; case remanded for rehearing with different officer
Claimant_Status: Shia Muslim from Pakistan seeking refugee status
Defendant_Behavior: RPD relied on outdated reports and ignored recent evidence of ongoing persecution
Grounds_for_Claim: Persecution based on religion (Shia Muslim) in Pakistan
Legal_Standard: Claimant must provide clear and convincing evidence of the state's inability to protect them
Assessment_Factor: Availability of state protection, changed country conditions, credibility of claimant
Procedural_Issue: Judicial review of administrative decision by RPD
Application_Basis: Fear of persecution as a member of a particular social group (Shia Muslims) in Pakistan
Evidence_Assessed: Recent evidence showing ongoing persecution of Shia Muslims
Relief_Sought: Allowance of refugee claim or remittal for reconsideration
Governing_Rule: Changed circumstances must be meaningful and effective to render fear of persecution unreasonable
Evidentiary_Deficiency: Selective reliance on outdated evidence; failure to consider more recent reports
Harm_Assessment: Risk of persecution due to religious identity as a Shia Muslim in Pakistan
Cause_Description: Applicant claimed refugee status based on persecution as a Shia Muslim in Pakistan, which the RPD rejected citing state protection
Evidence_Handling: RPD failed to properly assess current country conditions and overlooked recent evidence of persecution
Evidence_Issues: Use of outdated reports; omission of recent evidence on persecution
Evidence_Assessment: Insufficient and outdated evidence used to conclude state protection was available
Decision_Rationale: RPD's conclusion not supported by up-to-date and comprehensive evidence
Evidentiary_Issues: Failure to consider meaningful and effective changed circumstances; reliance on obsolete data
Legal_Standard_Applied: Whether the applicant has demonstrated that state protection is unavailable and fear of persecution is well-founded
